Name: Bitter Jean
Ingredients: 60 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
10 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Two Luxardo Maraschino Cherries on stick.
Review: Scotch malt whisky, and particularly peated malt, balance and work brilliantly with rich crème de cassis and full-bodied vermouth, helped by a generous dose of aromatic bitters.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2017 at Soho House in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bitter Jean contains 235 calories
